name: Space Mammoth
description:
Do you have what it takes to be Top Mammoth? Send your furry beast into space at high velocities and see if you have what it takes to navigate through nebulas and avoid the ultimate fate; Crashing into planets and being thrown into the sun!

I think it's time the birds take a break and maybe, I don't know, calm down? They're always so angry. It's the mammoth's time to shine (Or combust)! See how high on the leader boards you can get for distance traveled as a large, heavy, furry creature in a place without friction!
